Statement: DEL-04-02 implements SOW-0012 (Sustainability/energy narrative) as its primary scope item
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in Decomposition §10 scope ledger: SOW-0012 maps to PKG-004 DEL-04-02.

Statement: DEL-04-02 supports OBJ-004 (Deliver a strong Design Brief 5 pts) as its primary objective alignment
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in Decomposition §6 and §9 DEL-04-02 entry. OBJ-004 is the scored objective for the Design Brief.

Statement: DEL-04-02 requires envelope U-value targets from DEL-04-01 to size HVAC loads and validate efficiency claims
EvidenceQuote: Obtain envelope U-value targets (walls, roof, glazing) from DEL-04-01 author
Notes: FACT. Multiple sources confirm: Procedure.md Step 2 Coordination A; Guidance.md C-003 item 1; Datasheet.md Conditions "Envelope-HVAC Interdependence"; Specification.md scope exclusion for envelope.

Statement: DEL-04-02 requires baseline HVAC system types and equipment selections from DEL-02-04 to justify those choices from an energy perspective
EvidenceQuote: Review HVAC system types and equipment selections documented in DEL-02-04
Notes: FACT. Multiple sources: Procedure.md Step 2 Coordination C; Guidance.md C-003 item 3; Datasheet.md References "DEL-02-04"; Specification.md line 20.

Statement: DEL-04-02 requires coordination with DEL-04-03 on solar-ready electrical provisions (conduit routing and roof penetrations) to align mechanical and electrical solar rough-in
EvidenceQuote: Coordinate conduit routing from roof to mechanical room (solar thermal) and to electrical room (solar PV)
Notes: FACT. Multiple sources: Procedure.md Step 2 Coordination B; Guidance.md C-003 item 2 and P-004; Specification.md R-MEL-06 and R-MEL-09; _REFERENCES.md cross-reference.

Statement: DEL-04-02 requires building and roof orientation from DEL-02-01 architectural concept to confirm solar-ready roof orientation per Addendum 03
EvidenceQuote: DEL-02-01/DEL-02-02 (Architectural/Civil Concept) -- draft or concurrent: Building and roof orientation; solar-capable roof area location
Notes: FACT. Multiple sources: Procedure.md Prerequisites; Guidance.md C-002; Datasheet.md Conditions "Roof Orientation Constraint".

Statement: DEL-04-02 requires site plan orientation data from DEL-02-02 civil concept to confirm solar-ready roof orientation per Addendum 03
EvidenceQuote: actual building orientation on the 12-acre site is determined by the civil/architectural concept (DEL-02-01, DEL-02-02)
Notes: FACT. Sources: Guidance.md C-002; Datasheet.md Conditions "Roof Orientation Constraint". DEL-02-02 provides the site plan driving building orientation.

Statement: DEL-04-02 requires coordination with DEL-02-03 on structural loading allowance for future solar panels on roof
EvidenceQuote: structural loading allowance for future solar panels coordinated with DEL-02-03
Notes: FACT. Multiple sources: Specification.md R-MEL-06(a); Procedure.md Step 2 Coordination B; Datasheet.md Construction "Solar Readiness -- Structural".

Statement: DEL-04-02 requires Addendum 03 as a primary source for solar-capable roofing mandate and apparatus bay ventilation requirements
EvidenceQuote: Addendum 03 (Jul 31, 2024): Solar-capable roof; apparatus bay direct exhaust; PW bay ventilation; fill stations; sumps; 40 bunker gear lockers
Notes: FACT. Addendum 03 is the primary source for multiple requirements addressed by this deliverable (R-MEL-02 through R-MEL-06 and R-MEL-12/R-MEL-13).

Statement: DEL-04-02 requires the Owner Statement of Requirements (Appendix A / OSR) for energy and sustainability clauses
EvidenceQuote: RFP -- Owner Statement of Requirements (OSR / Appendix A): Reference OSR energy/sustainability clauses
Notes: FACT. OSR energy/sustainability clauses are referenced as prerequisite. Full text accessibility TBD per Datasheet.md References.

Statement: DEL-04-02 requires the Functional Program (Appendix B) for operational profile and DHW demand context
EvidenceQuote: Functional Program (Appendix B): Room types, operational profile, DHW demand context
Notes: FACT. Functional Program is listed as a prerequisite and referenced for zone-occupancy schedules in Datasheet.md Conditions.

Statement: DEL-04-02 energy-efficient system selections are consumed by DEL-05-03 which must address maintainability of those systems
EvidenceQuote: coordinated with DEL-05-03 (Mechanical Maintainability), which addresses maintainability in detail
Notes: FACT. Multiple sources: Guidance.md P-006; Specification.md scope item 9; Datasheet.md References "DEL-05-03".
